description.value:
You learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the Psionic Spells table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of 5th level or lower. The new spell must be a divination or an enchantment spell from the sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell list.

Psionic Spells

Sorcerer Level Spells
1st @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.02YWG7SFYVQ2T31P]{Arms of Hadar}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.IAP3DSC2U4ZESJ7Y]{Dissonant Whispers}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.VR0GU6G4Y2HK2HNG]{Mind Sliver}
3rd @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj]{Calm Emotions}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]{Detect Thoughts}
5th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.NBTD4H4INIB6C4EL]{Hunger of Hadar}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.GtGjNjPBgUHxGYAD]{Sending}
7th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.DGONTFbk5eORs5qv]{Black Tentacles}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.K4E2SG3P5F79QUU3]{Summon Aberration}
9th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.uAwtVZkiSTyP6ORB]{Telepathic Bond}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.HQfd7jJyULIoGxrZ]{Telekinesis}
